enWisdom: The lapse [and misguidance] of a scholar corrupts entire worlds

Wisdom: زَلَّةُ الْعَالِمِ كَانْكِسَارِ السَّفِينَةِ تَغْرَقُ وَتُغْرِقُ مَعَهَا غَيْرَهَا
enWisdom: The lapse of a scholar is like the breaking up of a ship, it sinks and causes others to sink along with it
The lapse of a scholar is a serious offence
Deviation of the guide is the destruction of the seeker of guidance

Wisdom: لَا زَلَّةَ أَشَدُّ مِنْ زَلَّةِ عَالِمٍ
enWisdom: There is no lapse more serious than the lapse of a scholar
